archiefmat.scope:
Contains mostly petitions for manumission with obligatory attachments (extract from slave register including a statement about the ability of the manumittee to earn a living after manumission). Occasionally also nominations for manumission presented to the governor by the government secretary are included, stating names of both manumitters and manumittees. These nominations were presented after the manumission was publicly announced in the newspapers and no opposition against the manumission was voiced.
No. 1016 contains one printed manumission act.
archiefmat.notes: The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
